bill_title: to authorize the referral of certain county zoning decisions.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to authorize the referral of certain county zoning decisions. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That chapter 7-18A be amended by adding thereto a NEW SECTION to read as follows: Any special exception or variance made pursuant to § 11-2-25.1, regardless of whether the variance or special exception is an administrative or legislative decision of the county as defined in § 7-18A-15.1, is subject to the referendum process established pursuant to § § 7-18A-15 to 7-18A-24, inclusive. 750 copies of this document were printed by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.015 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.

FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to provide for the appeal and resolution of certain zoning decisions. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That chapter 7-18A be amended by adding thereto a NEW SECTION to read as follows: Any special exception made by a board of adjustment or planning and zoning commission pursuant to § 11-2-25.1 may be appealed by an aggrieved party to the action to the board of county commissioners for final resolution. This section does not apply if a board of county commissioners acts as the planning commission or board of adjustment. Section 2. That chapter 7-18A be amended by adding thereto a NEW SECTION to read as follows: Any person aggrieved by a final decision of a board of county commissioners, as provided in section 1 of this Act, may appeal to circuit court pursuant to § 7-8-27. BILL HISTORY 1/31/97 First read in House and referred to Local Government. H.J. 241 2/6/97 Scheduled for Committee hearing on this date. 2/6/97 Deferred to another day. H.J. 337 2/11/97 Scheduled for Committee hearing on this date. 2/13/97 Scheduled for Committee hearing on this date. 2/13/97 Local Government Do Pass Amended, Passed, AYES 13, NAYS 0. 2/13/97 Local Government Title Amended. 2/18/97 Local Government Do Pass Amended, Passed, AYES 13, NAYS 0.

FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to authorize the referral of certain county zoning decisions. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1.
